actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to revise the period used for determining changes in the index of prices paid by farmers and in the national average yield per acre for the purpose of making adjustments in the target price of the 1976 crops of wheat, feed grains, and cotton.

summary.text: Revises, under the Agricultural Act, the period used for determining changes in the index of prices paid by farmers and in the national average yield per acre for the purpose of making adjustments in the target price of the 1976 and 1977 crops of wheat, feed grains, and cotton.

titles.title: A bill to revise the period used for determining changes in the index of prices paid by farmers and in the national average yield per acre for the purpose of making adjustments in the target price of the 1976 crops of wheat, feed grains, and cotton.
